title: HOUR 2- Philip Rivers Aug 26, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 2- Philip Rivers Aug 26, 2020
description:
Philip Rivers tells Dan that the new Colts uniform feels pretty good on him. Philip says he is glad that it has a lil blue in it like the Chargers. Philip tells Dan that he does still have all of his old Chargers gear and he is looking to keep it.

content:encoded:
Philip Rivers tells Dan that the new Colts uniform feels pretty good on him. Philip says he is glad that it has a lil blue in it like the Chargers. Philip tells Dan that he does still have all of his old Chargers gear and he is looking to keep it.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
